remarks: The natural logarithm of the product of two positive real numbers is the sum of natural logarithms.  Property 2 of [Cohen] p. 301, restricted to natural logarithms.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 25-Nov-2007.)
statement: relogmul $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) ) $.
